screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .fig file in The MathWorks MATLAB R2023a
screenshot.caption: FIG file open in The MathWorks MATLAB R2023a

description: MATLAB is an advanced application that provides various tools to analyze data, develop algorithms, create models, build apps, and more. In MATLAB, a figure is data visualized as a plot, such as a histogram or pie graph, output from mathematical data. Additionally, the figure function creates a figure (window), which allows you to insert plots and graphs.
NOTE: You can also save a figure as a FIG file with the saveas(fig,filename) function.
